meanings.sent1: The unshifting mountain stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent2: The unshifting tree provided shade all day long.
meanings.sent3: The unshifting rock refused to budge even when pushed.
meanings.sent4: Her unshifting determination led her to success.
meanings.sent5: The unshifting gaze of the owl captured its prey.

meanings.definition: Unable to be altered or modified.
meanings.sent1: The unshifting rules of the game were clear to all players.
meanings.sent2: His unshifting loyalty to his friends never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The unshifting schedule left no room for changes.
meanings.sent4: The unshifting contract protected both parties from changes.
meanings.sent5: The unshifting decision was final and could not be undone.

meanings.sent1: The unshifting weather made planning the picnic easy.
meanings.sent2: Her unshifting smile brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent3: The unshifting melody played on repeat in his mind.
meanings.sent4: The unshifting routine brought comfort to his daily life.
meanings.sent5: The unshifting rhythm of the waves soothed her soul.
